body.p: Since version 0.84+1.0, reloading configuration is in auto-mode. When GLPI detect a configuration modification, it send a query on Shinken webservice to restart the Arbiter module (module used to load the configuration). You can too force this restart in dashboard page, you have link appear named Restart Shinken.
body.note: A think to know, there is a protection to not restart Shinken in automatic mode if last restart is less than 5 minutes. But you can force with the link into the dashboard if you want to force the restart.
